Data: Kuldeep to Marsh, no run back of a length outside off, comes off the pitch quite slow as he shapes to cut. Ends up chopping it hard into the ground, towards backward point
Kuldeep to Marsh, 2 runs tossed up slow, wide of off stump, Marsh reaches out and plays a flat-bat drive to the left of deep point
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run back of a length outside off, sharp turn away from Marsh, who chooses to leave this alone
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run tossed up slow, turning from leg to off. Marsh gets forward, waits, and blocks it back to the bowler. He's bowling really slow today
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run another flighted ball on leg stump, clipped gently towards square leg
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run slow, short, a bit of width, slapped to sweeper cover
Siraj to Marsh, no run ooh, that's pretty quick, 139kph. Back of a length and slanting away from off stump. Jabs away from his body and is beaten
Siraj to Marsh, no run back of a length on middle and leg, lets it come on and plays with soft hands to keep it down into the leg side
Siraj to Marsh, no run length ball slanting across to off stump. Lets it come to him and dabs to backward point with an open face
Siraj to Marsh, 1 run back of a length on middle and leg, tucked away through midwicket
Siraj to Khawaja, no run length ball outside off, gets on the front foot and opens his bat face to ease it to backward point
Siraj to Khawaja, no run fullish, close to off stump, Khawaja plays a checked drive to mid-off
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run shortish again, fairly wide, slapped to sweeper cover
Kuldeep to Khawaja, 1 run back of a length, wrong'un coming in towards off stump. Goes on the back foot and punches to long-off

Kuldeep to Marsh, no run ooh, that's lovely. So far Marsh has sat on the back foot comfortably and this time Kuldeep's flight draws him forward. Dips and spins away sharply to beat his outside edge as he looks to stab through the covers with an angled bat
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run back to that leg-stump line, worked into the leg side
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run full on middle and leg, clipped away through square leg
Kuldeep to Khawaja, 1 run full on leg stump, whipped down the ground to long-on
Siraj to Khawaja, 1 wide short, down leg. Misses the pull and umpire Kettleborough signals wide
Siraj to Khawaja, no run fullish outside off, Khawaja plays a forceful, wristy drive, straight to short extra-cover
Siraj to Khawaja, 1 run back of a length on middle stump, whipped away to deep square leg

Siraj to Marsh, FOUR runs short, slanting away from off stump, but the ball sits up nicely and Marsh can pull it well in front of square, roll his wrists over it, and easily beat deep square leg to his left
Siraj to Marsh, no run back of a length on off stump, defended towards backward point
Siraj to Marsh, 1 run back of a length on middle and off. Stays leg-side of the ball and runs it down to third man with an open face

Siraj to Khawaja, FOUR runs shortish on middle stump - it's not a long-hop, and it only gets up to stump height, but Khawaja's a damn good puller, gets across his stumps and puts it away, with his front leg up in the air and a lovely whip of his wrists to give it impetus, beats deep square leg throwing himself to his le
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run down the pitch to the loopy off-stump ball. Meets it on the full and whips to deep midwicket
Kuldeep to Khawaja, no run nicely flighted on off stump, Khawaja gets forward and defends into the off side
Kuldeep to Khawaja, 1 run back of a length, pitching on off stump and straightening away. Punched to sweeper cover
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run flatter and quicker now. Fairly full but he plays the trajectory rather than the length. Goes back and across and defends it back to the bowler
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run down the track again, drives it hard and mid-on dives right to keep it down to one
Kuldeep to Khawaja, 1 run shortish googly, goes deep in his crease and pulls to deep midwicket
Siraj to Khawaja, 1 run 138kph, short into the rips, he swivels and rolls the wrists on a pull shot, hitting it hard to fine leg
Siraj to Marsh, 1 run 137kph, back of a length, angled across the left-hander, he guides this with an open face to third man
Siraj to Khawaja, 1 wide 134kph, pushed too far wide of off, and called a wide
Siraj to Khawaja, 1 run 140kph, short ball outside off, he pulls but doesn't time it, through square leg to the man in the deep
Siraj to Marsh, FOUR runs cut hard in the air over backward point! 137kph, short and wide and Marsh thrashes his hands at it, carving it over backward point and it flies to the fence.
Siraj to Marsh, 1 run 137kph, wide but a touch fuller, he's back and late cutting off the toe of the bat to third man
Siraj to Khawaja, FOUR runs 135kph, short on the hip and he cracks a pull shot, classical stroke with the front knee up, he placed it perfectly between fine leg and deep square!
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run looped up very full on middle, he shuffles out and yorks himself
Kuldeep to Marsh, 2 runs short and wider, he late cuts, gets a top edge but it flies well wide of slip towards third man for a couple
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run 78kph, full drifting into leg, he skips down and works this into the leg side but can't beat midwicket
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run again he's down the track whipping to midwicket
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run 73kph, tossed up outside off, he dances down and drives fluently to long off

Kuldeep to Khawaja, no run edged and it's dropped by Dhoni! It was shorter, he went back to cut, flashed hard, got a thickish edge, tough to handle, it bounces off Dhoni and ricochet's wide of slip! Hard to know if the edge was too much to react to
Jadeja to Marsh, no run shorter on leg, he tucks it around the corner
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 wide fired down the leg side for a wide
Jadeja to Marsh, no run shorter on leg, he turns it around the corner
Jadeja to Marsh, no run shorter on leg, he pulls to the square leg on the circle
Jadeja to Marsh, 2 runs shorter down leg, he glances this nicely fine for a couple
Jadeja to Marsh, no run 91kph, shorter, spinning into off, he is back and punching off the back foot to cover-point
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run fuller on middle and off, he turns this with the spin through square leg to the sweeper
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run 81kph. shorter leg break, he's back and cutting hard to deep cover
Kuldeep to Khawaja, no run looped up, 73kph, he skips down and works this against the turn to midwicket

Kuldeep to Khawaja, OUT Khawaja might be run out! Jadeja with a direct hit. It's sent upstairs He's OUT! it was pushed through outside off, he chops a cut to cover-point and runs, Jadeja swoops to his left, gathers one-handed, takes one step and fires with a rocket to the non-striker's and hits! Khawaja was only centime
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run 78kph, wrong un on off, he defends on the front foot into the off side
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run looped up, he skips down and drives to long on
Kuldeep to Handscomb, no run wrong un outside off, he pushes out and defends
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run shorter outside off, he stands up and punches down to long on
Jadeja to Handscomb, 2 runs shorter outside off, he's back and pushing this past cover, nicely placed and they get two
Jadeja to Handscomb, no run tossed up outside off, he is happy to leave this alone
Jadeja to Handscomb, 1 run 93kph, tossed up closer to off, he drives on the front foot to long off
Jadeja to Marsh, no run shorter, he cuts in the air but just short of short third man
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run fuller on off, he drives with the spin to long on
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run 80kph, leg break, on middle and leg, he's back, it slides on, he chops down on it to cover
Kuldeep to Marsh, 2 runs tossed up, he drives, bouncing it over cover for a couple
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run tossed up on off, he skips down and drives to long on
Kuldeep to Handscomb, 1 run 75kph, tossed up on off, he dances out and pushes this past the bowler to long on
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run looped up on off, he skips out and drives firmly to long off
Kuldeep to Handscomb, FOUR runs 75kph, shorter on off, he gives room and cuts with excellent timing and beats backward point! Nicely placed. Fast feet to get back and create the room. Great shot
Jadeja to Marsh, FOUR runs 94kph, short ball, he jumps on this length, he's back and pulling this over midwicket into the gap and one bounce over the rope!
Jadeja to Marsh, no run fuller on middle and leg, he turns this behind square
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run shorter ball, he pulls over straight midwicket but wide long on is cutting this off, just the one
Jadeja to Handscomb, 1 run 94kph, tossed up outside off, he drives easily to long off
Jadeja to Marsh, no run 91kph, angled into leg, he turns this behind square to the fielder in the circle
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run shorter on leg, he's back and whipping this off his thigh to deep forward square
Shami to Marsh, 1 run 138kph, fuller on leg, he clips this to wide mid on and takes one with the fielder set on the circle
Shami to Handscomb, no run 138kph, shorter length on off, he is squared up on the back foot defending
Shami to Handscomb, no run 128kph, fuller outside off, he mistimes a drive to cover
Shami to Handscomb, 2 runs 142kph, short ball, he swivels on the pull shot rolling this well wide of fine leg and DK runs around and makes a good diving save, but they get two
Shami to Handscomb, 1 run 140kph, shorter outside off, he's back and running this off the face with a late cut to third man
Shami to Marsh, 1 run 140kph, on off, back of a length, he's back and chopping this off the inside edge just past leg stump! That wasn't far away, it rolled to fine leg
Jadeja to Marsh, no run shorter length, he's back and pulling to midwicket, Kohli makes a good stop
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run tossed up, he skips out and drives to long on
Jadeja to Handscomb, 1 run 90kph, tossed up, outside off, he drives down to long off
Jadeja to Marsh, FOUR runs 91kph, good length, he skips down and hammers a drive straight back past the bowler with power and beats wide long on who stood no chance! What a great shot

Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run shorter on leg, he's back and working off the hip through square leg. 50 for Marsh. Two in a row. After a century against South Africa in November. He's played well in this format
Jadeja to Handscomb, no run tossed up outside off, he reaches out to drive mistiming this to cover
Shami to Marsh, no run good length on off, he defends on the front foot to cover
Shami to Marsh, no run back of a length on off, he's back and working this to midwicket
Shami to Marsh, no run 127kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot to cover-point
Shami to Marsh, no run 143kph, back of a length on leg, he's tucked up and forced to bunt it down into the leg side
Shami to Marsh, FOUR runs 141kph, full on his pads and Marsh loves this stuff, he clips this elegantly through forward square, it races across the outfield to the short boundary!
Shami to Marsh, no run 142kph, length ball outside off, he has big swipe across the line and misses
Jadeja to Handscomb, 1 run tossed up on leg, he turns this behind square leg for an easy one
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run shorter length on leg, he's back and tucking this through forward square
Jadeja to Handscomb, no run shorter on off, he's back and punching this straight back to Jadeja
Jadeja to Handscomb, 1 run fuller, pushed through on off, he drives towards long off and Jadeja gets in a tangle with Marsh meaning the ball could roll away for one
Jadeja to Marsh, no run fired in on off, he defends on the front foot
Jadeja to Marsh, 2 runs 95kph, good length outside off, he skips out and drives very nicely on the up against the turn past cover wide of long off for a couple
Siraj to Handscomb, no run 134kph, good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot to backward point
Siraj to Handscomb, no run 136kph, good length on off, he drives slices this as his bat came down across the line, back to the bowler
Siraj to Handscomb, FOUR runs steps way outside off and glances this from off stump! It runs fine and races away, DK dives at fine leg but can't make the save!
Siraj to Handscomb, 1 run 135kph, fuller outside off, he square drives to deep point
Siraj to Marsh, no run good length wide of off, he tried to cut but mistimed it cover
Siraj to Marsh, FOUR runs short on the hip, 136kph, Marsh swivels and smacks this wide of fine leg for four! Too easy for Marsh. He is so quick on anything there
Jadeja to Handscomb, no run tossed up angled across, he drives straight to cover

Jadeja to Handscomb, OUT Stumped! Slick from Dhoni! Handscomb tried to sweep a very full ball, was beaten by length, it spun past off, Dhoni takes it well, Handscomb's back foot is out of the crease, he didn't realise. Dhoni did. He whipped the bails off and Handscomb looked down and saw his foot was out!
Jadeja to Stoinis, no run full on off stump, defended to short extra-cover
Jadeja to Stoinis, no run a bit more flight, not as full. Comes forward to defend and he gets a thickish outside edge to backward point
Jadeja to Stoinis, no run length ball on off stump, blocked to short extra

Jadeja to Stoinis, no run lovely delivery, floats this one across the right-hander and pitches it outside off, inviting the drive into the covers. Stoinis isn't fully forward to it, and the ball dips on him and spins past his outside edge
Siraj to Marsh, 1 run full, slanting away into a wide-ish line outside off, driven to deep point
Siraj to Stoinis, no run back of a length outside off, left alone
Siraj to Stoinis, no run full, fairly wide outside off with a tiny bit of outswing. Reaches out to stab towards extra-cover

Siraj to Stoinis, no run whoa, lovely delivery. Full, angling into the fifth-stump line from wide of the crease, and some late, late swing takes it past the outside edge as Stoinis goes for a hard-hands drive, aiming towards mid-off
Siraj to Stoinis, no run back of a length on off stump, defended to midwicket
Siraj to Stoinis, 1 run wide of the crease again, fullish and anging into off stump. Clipped to deep midwicket
Jadeja to Stoinis, 1 run fullish, slanting across to pitch just outside off. Stretches out nicely to lap-sweep to the right of short fine leg
Jadeja to Marsh, no run flat length ball close to off stump, driven firmly back to the bowler
Jadeja to Marsh, no run sharp spin from a middle-stump line. Beats the flick to hit the front pad. Easily missing leg, though
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run lovely quick feet out of the crease to the flighted ball on middle and off, clips it away through square leg
Jadeja to Stoinis, 1 run shortish, pitching on the stumps and turning a fair bit away to give Stoinis some width. Slapped to deep point
Jadeja to Marsh, 2 runs sharp turn again, heading down leg, Marsh opens up to whip it through square leg
Siraj to Stoinis, no run back of a length close to off stump, punched firmly to extra-cover

Siraj to Stoinis, FOUR runs drifts onto the pads and that's sensational timing from Stoinis, basically just let it come to him and clips it away when it's right under his eyes. Fine leg didn't have a lot of distance to cover to his left but it was past him before he could even react
Siraj to Stoinis, 1 run length ball on middle stump, shows the full face for a pushed single to mid-on
Siraj to Marsh, 1 run back of a length, close to off stump, lets it come to him and meets it when it's almost past him, with an adroitly angled blade, to help it down to third man
Siraj to Stoinis, no run fullish outside off, sixth-stump line, left alone
Siraj to Stoinis, no run back of a length, a little closer to off stump, punched to backward point
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run shortish outside off, slapped hard and Jadeja dives right at cover to make a good stop
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length, turning into the pads, goes deep in his crease to work it round to deep backward square leg
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run loops it up outside off and Marsh is out of his crease to squeeze a drive past the diving backward point fielder
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length, pitches on leg stump and he goes right back once more to work it with the spin through backward square leg
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run flighted ball on middle stump, nice stride forward to drive to long-on

Kuldeep to Stoinis, 2 runs length ball pitching on middle and off and turning towards leg. Shuffles across without coming forward or going back, and tickles it away into the fine leg region. Would have been worth an lbw shout if he'd missed
Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 1 run length ball slanting away from off stump, stays back to jab into the point region
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length, angling into off stump, goes back and across to tuck it away through square leg

Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 1 run length ball on middle and off and Marsh is a little slow taking off for the single after pushing to mid-off. Makes it easily in the end, not the smoothest of pick-ups and throws from Jadeja, for a change, and he misses the stumps too
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, no run back of a length, close to off stump, punched to short extra
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, no run length ball on off stump, clipped to midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length on off stump, jumps across to work it through square leg
Kuldeep to Stoinis, no run floated up slow and full on off stump, driven back powerfully but too close to the bowler to profit from it
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 2 runs flighted lavishly once more and this time Stoinis looks to stay slightly leg-side of the ball and drive inside-out. Ends up slicing it into the point region
Kuldeep to Stoinis, no run flatter, slanted across to a wide-ish line outside off. Not short enough to cut and Stoinis leaves it alone
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run tossed up outside off, stretches forward, waits, and dabs gently to the left of backward point

Kuldeep to Marsh, FOUR runs down the track - he's done this right through the innings, whenever he's seen it tossed up above his eyeline - and he skips away from the line just a little to give himself room to swing through a nice, clean arc and loft it flat, back over the bowler's head
Kuldeep to Marsh, 2 runs once again some flight, driven along the ground this time to the right of long-on
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length, fifth-stump line, lets it come and jabs it into the cover point region to give the strike back to Marsh
Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 2 runs back of a length on the pads, worked away to the right of long leg

Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 1 run ooh, nearly. Length ball close to off stump. Possibly didn't quite come on the way Marsh thought it would. Comes forward to knock a short single into the cover region, ends up inside-edging, on the bounce, past his leg stump

Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, no run back of a length outside off, Stoinis shuffles across and out of his crease to get close to the ball and push into the covers. The fielder at short extra moves quickly to his left to cut off the single. Dhawan, I think
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, no run length ball on off stump, punched to mid-off
Bhuvneshwar to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length outside off, dabs it towards point with soft hands and gets that single he had been after for a while
Jadeja to Stoinis, 1 run shortish, pulled to deep midwicket from outside off stump

Jadeja to Marsh, FOUR runs shot! Flat length ball outside off, and Marsh uses that bit of width expertly. Gets on the front foot, lets the ball come on, and cuts it late to beat backward point to his right
Jadeja to Marsh, no run back of a length, closer to off stump, chopped to backward point
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run length ball turning in towards off and middle, clipped away through midwicket
Jadeja to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length on off stump, flat-batted down the ground to long-on
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run skips out of his crease and Jadeja bowls it full, at his feet. Clipped away to deep square leg
Shami to Marsh, 1 run shortish, gets up to hip height on off stump, pulled to deep square leg
Shami to Stoinis, FOUR runs digs it in short outside off, gets it up to shoulder height, and Stoinis does very well to put that away, sees it early and swats it away, in the air but wide of mid-on

Shami to Stoinis, FOUR runs bam. Full and outside off and Stoinis smacks it back down the ground with the full face showing. A half-chance for Shami, had to stretch his left arm out to catch it at about chest height. Only got his fingertips to it, though
Shami to Stoinis, OUT and he gets him next ball. Shortish outside off, doesn't climb as high as Stoinis expects as he goes for the pull. Only manages a bottom edge through to Dhoni
Shami to Maxwell, no run Shami greets him with a bouncer rising over off stump. Ducks down low to get under it
Shami to Maxwell, no run another bouncer, sharper one this time. Maxwell gets across his crease and just about manages to get his front shoulder out of the way
Jadeja to Marsh, no run flat, speared into the pads, clipped off the front foot to square leg
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run back of a length on middle and leg, worked away to the right of the diving square leg fielder
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length on off stump, punched to deep point
Jadeja to Marsh, no run length ball turning into the pads, worked to square leg

Jadeja to Marsh, FOUR runs shot. Jadeja had tucked him up for room right through this over. Finally he gets one outside off, and can free his arms. Gets on the front foot and slog-sweeps powerfully to the wide long-on boundary
Jadeja to Marsh, no run flat again, on middle stump, clipped to straight midwicket
Shami to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length, close to off stump, punched to sweeper cover
Shami to Marsh, 1 run back of a length on off stump, lets it come on and dabs gently to the right of backward point

Shami to Maxwell, FOUR runs oh my, top edge, and four lucky runs for Maxwell. Digs it in short again, outside off, and Maxwell has to jump up to make any sort of contact with his attempted hook. The top edge loops over Dhoni and rolls down to the boundary
Shami to Maxwell, 1 run in the blockhole close to off stump, jabs down on it and squeezes it to the right of backward point
Shami to Marsh, 1 run length ball on the stumps, shuffles across and clips it to deep square leg
Shami to Maxwell, no run another yorker, angling into middle stump. Digs it out, plays it back to the bowler
Jadeja to Marsh, no run length ball turning in towards off stump, defended to midwicket
Jadeja to Marsh, no run flat, fullish on middle stump, clipped to midwicket
Jadeja to Marsh, no run fired in quick on off stump, spotted Marsh premeditating and hanging back. Forced to jam down quickly on it to defend
Jadeja to Marsh, no run down the track now and Jadeja again fires it in full, at his feet. Whipped to midwicket
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run down the track again, slows it down this time on a middle-and-leg line. Driven to long-on
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run flat outside off, opens his bat face to stab into the backward point region
Kuldeep to Maxwell, 3 runs shortish, turning down leg, and Maxwell helps it away towards the fine leg boundary. Karthik chases it all the way from square leg to stop it near the boundary

Kuldeep to Marsh, FOUR runs floated up slow outside off, makes a bit of room and slashes it away nicely to the left of backward point. The sweeper on that boundary sprinted hard to his right and put in a sprawling drive, but to no avail
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run down the track and Kuldeep straightens his line, jabbed back to the bowler

Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run and there's the hundred, lovely innings from Marsh, this, his seventh ODI hundred. Down the track, typically, to get there. Flighted ball outside off and he drives it to long-off to bring up the landmark
Kuldeep to Maxwell, 1 run shortish googly, not much turn. Just goes with the angle towards off stump. Goes deep in his crease to pull to deep midwicket
Kuldeep to Marsh, no run shortish outside off, chopped to the left of backward point, where Jadeja gets to the ball in a flash to cut off the single
Siraj to Maxwell, 1 run length ball angling in towards off stump, jabbed away to the left of mid-off
Siraj to Marsh, 1 run slower ball, back of a length, angling across to off stump. Waits on it and dabs to third man
Siraj to Maxwell, no run length ball close to off stump, creates some inward angle by going wide of the crease. Maxwell blocks to short extra-cover
Siraj to Maxwell, 1 run full on middle stump, whipped away to deep square leg
Siraj to Marsh, 1 run in the blockhole on middle and off, makes a bit of room and squeezes it away through cover point
Siraj to Maxwell, no run fullish on off stump, Maxwell plays a checked drive to extra-cover
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run once again, a touch short outside off, and Marsh slaps up his thousandth single to the off-side sweeper off Kuldeep

Kuldeep to Maxwell, SIX runs bam! That's marginally short on off stump, and Maxwell is back in a flash. Slowness of the pitch helps too, and the slowness of Kuldeep. Swivels powerfully through the hips to pull it away, high over the midwicket boundary
Kuldeep to Maxwell, 1 run flatter, the flipper/slider out of the front of the hand, on middle and off. Maxwell gets forward and shows the full face to pick up a single to long-off
Kuldeep to Marsh, SIX runs flights it now, outside off, and Marsh steps out and lofts it inside-out, easily clears the wide long-off boundary. Not the greatest over from Kuldeep, this
Kuldeep to Marsh, 1 run short outside off, slapped to deep point
Kuldeep to Maxwell, 1 run short on off and middle, rocks back and pulls along the ground to the left of deep square leg
Siraj to Maxwell, FOUR runs 117kph, chest high slower, Maxwell is back and hammering a pull shot to the short square boundary!
Siraj to Maxwell, no run 140kph, length into leg, he went to flip this over the short square boundary as well, got a thick inside edge onto pad

Siraj to Maxwell, no run Given LBW! Maxwell reviews. Was this sliding down? It was fired into full and angling leg side. He tried to whip and was beaten for pace. Nothing on hot spot. Nothing on RTS. No bat involved. Ball tracking says missing leg stump! Not out. Good review from Maxwell
Siraj to Maxwell, FOUR runs 139kph, full and wide, Maxwell backs away reaches out with one hand and slices this past backward point and away to the rope! What a shot!
Siraj to Maxwell, 1 leg bye 139kph, low full toss, inside edge onto pad, it rolls past off stump to short third man
Siraj to Marsh, FOUR runs full toss wide of off, Marsh cracks a cover-drive, smoking it past the man in the circle to the rope! Easy pickings.
Shami to Maxwell, FOUR runs 138kph, full toss on off, he steps outside leg and lofts this up and over cover! Incredible hands to slice it into the gap! Deliberately done
Shami to Maxwell, no run 127kph, slower ball, length outside off, he goes leg side again but misses. Maxwell yells at himself for missing that
Shami to Maxwell, 1 run 122kph, slower ball, follows him down leg as he backs away, he glances in the air just short of short fine! They get one as the fielder knocks it down
Shami to Marsh, SIX runs length on leg, 131kph, and Marsh pumps this over the short boundary way back into the stands at square leg! A gift from Shami. Marsh says thank you!
Shami to Marsh, 1 run wide half-volley he cracks a square drive firmly to deep point
Shami to Maxwell, 1 run 136kph, thigh high full toss, he sits back and whips this with a flourish behind square
Bhuvneshwar to Maxwell, 1 wide 118kph, slower ball, right on the guideline outside off, Maxwell backs away but the umpire calls wide! Unlucky there. Not sure that was a wide
Bhuvneshwar to Maxwell, 2 runs 117kph, length slower ball, he carves it to deep cover-point, Maxwell calls two and takes on the throw and beats it easily!
Bhuvneshwar to Maxwell, no run wide yorker, well bowled, slides under the bat outside off
Bhuvneshwar to Maxwell, no run 115kph, slower ball wide of off, Maxwell swings very hard and misses. Beautifully bowled. Deceived for pace
Bhuvneshwar to Maxwell, 1 run 116kph, length slower ball wide of off, he toes a cut shot to cover, runs with the stroke a misfield on the circle means there's no run out chance
Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, SIX runs 121kph, length ball in the slot, Marsh clears the right leg and heaves this way over deep square into the Members! Right in the hitting arc and he cashed in
Bhuvneshwar to Marsh, 2 runs 136kph, full on middle, he drives back past the bowler, straight of long on and they get an easy two
Siraj to Maxwell, 2 runs wide half-volley, he carves this in the air towards the man at deep point and it's just short of him running in, they get two

Siraj to Maxwell, 1 run dropped by Rohit Sharma at cover! Almost a freakish catch! It was crushed at cover, Rohit threw his right hand up above his head, it almost stuck, he had three bites at it but couldn't hold on!
Siraj to Marsh, 1 run full outside off, he lofts a cover-drive straight if the man in the deep
Siraj to Maxwell, FOUR runs 138kph, low full toss, he sits back and whips this through midwicket and the timing is good enough to beat wide long on running around!
Siraj to Maxwell, no run 141kph, bouncer, outside off, he tries to upper cut and misses, it's not called for height. Well bowled
Siraj to Maxwell, 1 run full into middle and leg, he whips this out through midwicket to the sweeper

5.45pm Innings break India need 299 in the chase. It could have been a lot more if not for the last three overs from Bhuvneshwar Kumar and Mohammed Shami. They took 4 for 17 in the last 18 balls. Bhuvi getting the crucial scalps of Shaun Marsh and Glenn Maxwell. Could have saved India 10-20 runs, maybe more. Marsh was sublime.

Maxwell to Rayudu, OUT caught at deep midwicket! The pressure got to him! He skips down and tries to launch this with the spin high over midwicket, it was a touch slower, he got underneath it and skied it high to deep midwicket, Stoinis camped under it and took the catch!
Maxwell to Kohli, no run shorter on leg, he is back and working this to square leg
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run shorter length, he's back and pulling forward of square to the sweeper
Behrendorff to Kohli, no run 127kph, back of a length angled across him, he defends on the walk, it nipped away a touch and he had to check his attempt to work to leg
Behrendorff to Kohli, 1 run shorter outside off, 126kph, he is back and running this with the angle to third man
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 2 runs shorter outside off, he cuts nicely past backward point wide of third man and they get two
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run 132kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run 129kph, cutter back of a length outside off, he defends from the crease to cover
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run shorter length outside off, 129kph, he's back and across and working this around the corner to fine leg
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run 89kph tossed up on off, he defends on the front foot to midwicket
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run shorter length, he pulls around the corner to square leg in the circle
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run tossed up on off, he turns this off the front foot to midwicket
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run flatter on leg, he turns this with the spin to square leg
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run round arm, slung into middle, he defends back to the bowler
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run tossed up outside off, he pushes this to the gap at cover-point
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run 131kph, back of a length on off, he's back and tucking this behind square for one
Behrendorff to Kohli, 2 runs 131kph, good length outside off, he drives on the up through cover-point straight of the sweeper
Behrendorff to Kohli, FOUR runs short and wide and he cracks a punch off the back foot with power through cover, beats the sweeper this time! Finally a boundary for Kohli. Here we go
Behrendorff to Kohli, no run good length on off, 130kph, he turns this on the front foot to midwicket
Behrendorff to Kohli, SIX runs Boom over long on! Out of nowhere! This was overpitched outside off, mid on is up, he whips his hands through the line and lofts this high over the long boundary!
Behrendorff to Kohli, 1 run back of a length outside off, he's back and smoking a cut shot straight to deep point. He yells in anger that he didn't get it wide of the sweeper
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run tossed up outside off, he drives with a strong bottom hand to long on
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run shorter outside off, he's back and finessing this with a flick through cover-point
Lyon to Kohli, FOUR runs drifting outside off, he uses the pace and dabs this fine of short third man! It runs away to the rope! Kohli has flicked the switch
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run shorter on middle, 89kph, he's back and tucking this around the corner
Lyon to Dhoni, no run tossed up outside off, he skips down and defends back to Lyon
Lyon to Dhoni, no run pushed through outside, he's back but forcing this to cover
Stoinis to Kohli, 2 leg byes drifts onto Kohli's legs and he tickles it away into the fine-leg region
Stoinis to Kohli, no run once again, angling it down leg slightly. Misses the flick and is hit on the front pad
Stoinis to Kohli, no run length ball on off stump. Pokes it to point and thinks of a single, but it's going straight to the fielder at a pretty decent pace
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to nurdle it into the square leg region
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run length ball outside off, gets on the front foot and jabs to point
Stoinis to Dhoni, 2 runs back of a length outside off, stabbed away to the left of the diving cover fielder and they run two while deep point runs to his right to tidy up

Lyon to Kohli, SIX runs down the track to the flighted ball on off stump and Kohli hits it into the safest region possible. Skips inside the line to make himself a tiny bit of room, and hits it high and dead straight, back over the umpire's head, and it thuds into the sightscreen
Lyon to Kohli, no run wider now, presses forward to drive to extra-cover

Lyon to Kohli, 2 runs not short by any means, just a length ball outside off, rocks back, deep in his crease, and carves it away to the left of the man at deep point, forcing Handscomb into a sprawling save by the boundary
Lyon to Kohli, 2 runs back of a length on middle and leg, worked away to the left of long leg
Lyon to Kohli, no run flat length ball on the pads, clipped to short fine leg
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run once again, a flat length ball, on middle and leg, this time he works it away to deep midwicket
Stoinis to Kohli, no run back of a length on off stump, punched to cover
Stoinis to Kohli, no run fullish outside off, stretches out and drives to cover point
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run shuffles down the pitch and Stoinis bangs it in short. Pulled along the ground to deep square leg
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover

Stoinis to Kohli, no run shout for lbw as Kohli takes a big step forward and across and looks to work it into the leg side from a stump-to-stump line. Hit high on the thigh pad - probably premeditated there, against a ball he should have gone back to

Stoinis to Kohli, FOUR runs short, just a bit of width, and Kohli jumps to ride the bounce and play a shot he isn't normally known for, the square cut. Flashes to the left of the man at backward point, and third man has no chance. Into the 90s now
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run length ball angling into off stump, clips it to the right of mid-on and hurries through to the other end
Jhye Richardson to Kohli, 2 runs fullish on off stump, clipped away crisply to the right of mid-on, who has to put in a sprawling dive to keep it down to two
Jhye Richardson to Kohli, 1 run banged in short, gets it up to shoulder height. Rolls his wrists over the pull to play it along the ground to deep square leg
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, no run full, almost in the blockhole, on middle stump. Clipped to midwicket
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, no run bouncer, rising fairly steeply over off stump. Dhoni watches it well, gets across it, and ducks under
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 2 runs back of a length on off stump, nice use of the wrists to work it through square leg
Stoinis to Kohli, no run shortish on off stump, shuffles across and whips it to midwicket
Stoinis to Kohli, no run shortish outside off, stops on Kohli a little. Wanted to punch it through the covers, ended up hitting it towards mid-on off the inside half of the bat
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run back of a length, close to off stump, watches it well and guides it down to third man
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run back of a length close to off stump, punched with a straight bat to the left of mid-off, not far enough to his left to pick up one
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run another bouncer, Dhoni ducks under it
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run full on off stump, punched back to the bowler, who spots Dhoni briefly out of his crease and flings a throw to the other end. Misses the stumps, though
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run full on off stump, steps forward and across and whips this to deep square leg

Siddle to Dhoni, 2 runs down the track and Siddle sees him coming. Bangs it in and gets it to rise towards his chest. Dhoni spins around and sends a miscontrolled pull soaring towards the fielder at long leg, but Behrendorff, diving forward, can't quite get to the ball before it lands
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run short again, angling into Dhoni's left ribcage. Pulled along the ground this time to long leg
Siddle to Kohli, 1 wide bouncer, climbs loopily, well over Kohli's head, before dropping down tennis-ball style into Carey's gloves
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run short, wide, sits up nicely for Kohli to cut. The sweeper on the cover point boundary runs quickly to his left and pulls off a sliding stop. Handscomb, I think
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 wide another loopy bouncer, Dhoni barely has to duck to get under it
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length outside off, gets across to get close to the line and pokes it to the left of cover
Siddle to Kohli, no run steps out of his crease and across to the off side to a fullish ball from Siddle. Looks to flick from well outside off stump, gets a thick outside edge to short third man

Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 leg bye that's super running. Back of a length, angling slightly down leg. Shuffles across and misses the flick, and the ball drops down by Dhoni's feet, to his left, after hitting his pad. Just one bit of eye contact across the pitch is enough for both batsmen to steal a hurried leg-bye
Jhye Richardson to Kohli, no run back of a length, close to off stump, opens his bat face to dab to backward point

Jhye Richardson to Kohli, 1 run ooh, that's a rare uncontrolled hoick from Kohli. Fullish, on off stump, looks to whip it over the leg side and gets a thick edge that nearly carries all the way to third man. Lands about three or four feet in front of him
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length on off stump, punched towards mid-off and he finds Finch a touch too deep and on his heels
Jhye Richardson to Kohli, no run back of a length outside off, looks for the dab to third man but backward point moves quickly to intercept
Jhye Richardson to Kohli, 1 run shortish outside off, swatted down the ground with a horizontal bat, bounces down to long-on

Siddle to Kohli, 2 runs And there it is, shuffles across to tuck this back-of-a-length delivery from a fifth-stump line to the fielder at deep square leg. Hundred number 39. THIRTY NINE! Here I was thinking he was still somewhere in the mid-to-high 20s. Wow. Not much of a celebration, just a fist pump. Keeps his helmet
Siddle to Kohli, 1 run in the blockhole on middle and off, clipped to the right of deep square leg
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 wide slower bouncer wide outside off, Dhoni leaves it alone

Siddle to Dhoni, 2 runs great running. Back of a length, fifth-stump line. Dhoni jumps across and uses his wrists to work it into the vacant mid-on region, and both batsmen knew as soon as he made contact that two runs were on
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run length ball on off stump, presses forward and shows the full face to send it rolling past the diving bowler towards long-on

Siddle to Kohli, 1 run full on middle stump, and Kohli chips it in the air - not sure if it was intentional - on the bounce to long-on. I think he was looking to flick it more through midwicket, and ended up checking his shot
Siddle to Dhoni, 2 runs in the blockhole on leg stump, steps across to clip to the left of long leg
Jhye Richardson to Kohli, 1 run length ball on off stump, clipped quietly to deep midwicket
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 2 runs length ball on off stump, stands utterly still until the ball reaches him, and jabs it away to the right of third man
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run slower ball, back of a length, on middle stump. Dhoni shuffles across and nurdles it into the midwicket region. No one saving one on the leg side

Jhye Richardson to Kohli, OUT whoopsie. A huge moment for Australia, this. This is full, a half-volley on leg stump, and I don't know if Kohli was looking to hit this in the air, but he's flicked it, possibly a touch earlier than he wanted to, timed it perhaps better than he wanted to, and picked out the fielder at deep
Jhye Richardson to Karthik, 1 run shortish, rising towards Karthik's ribcage. Jumps across and tucks it into the backward square leg region
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run length ball on middle stump, worked away to deep backward square leg
Lyon to Dhoni, no run flat, leg-stumpish. Shuffles across to try and work it behind square, and he misses. Ball hits his thigh pad
Lyon to Dhoni, 2 runs down the track now and Lyon bowls it on Dhoni's pad, flicked to the right of deep midwicket

Lyon to Dhoni, SIX runs bam! Down the track and Lyon feeds him just where he wants the ball. A bit of flight, and outside off stump, and he can free his arms and hoick it away, with the turn, over the wide long-on boundary
Lyon to Dhoni, no run flat length ball sliding on towards off stump, clipped back to the bowler
Lyon to Dhoni, 2 runs back of a length on off stump, makes room and forces it past extra-cover diving left, and picks up two more
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run flighted and full on off stump, brings out that trademark straight-bat bottom-hand push to long-on to retain the strike
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 leg bye back of a length, angling into Dhoni's left hip. Tucked away to long leg
Jhye Richardson to Karthik, 1 run full on middle stump, clipped to deep midwicket
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length on off stump, shuffles across and nudges it away through backward square leg

Jhye Richardson to Karthik, FOUR runs short, gets it up to shoulder height over off stump, and how good a shot is that from DK? Steps back and across, swivels, rolls his wrists over, and finds the gap to the right of deep square leg, nearly hooks it for six. Bounces just a foot or so short of the rope
Jhye Richardson to Karthik, 1 run length ball on off stump, clipped to the right of mid-on

Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 wide back of a length, gets his line all wrong. With pretty much everyone in the circle on the off side, he doesn't want to give Dhoni any width, and he ends up whanging it down the leg side. Dhoni merely steps across and shoulders arms
Jhye Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to tuck it through square leg
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run full, angling into off stump, blocked back to the bowler. I guess he was looking for the single to long-on but hit it straighter than intended
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run full outside off, opens his bat face slightly to ease it past the left-hand of the diving extra-cover fielder
Stoinis to Karthik, 2 runs low full-toss outside off, punches it with a straight bat to the left of long-off

Stoinis to Karthik, FOUR runs don't bowl short to Dinesh Karthik. Not today, at least. Sits up on an off-stump line, and he hits it up and over, into the gap between long leg and deep forward square leg
Stoinis to Karthik, no run length ball outside off, driven to extra-cover

Stoinis to Karthik, 2 runs length ball on off stump, looks like the offcutter. Clips it down the ground, doesn't put too much weight behind his shot, and they can pick up two by the time long-on sprints forward and to his right to get to it
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length, slanting across into a fourth-stump line. Lots of bottom hand in that whip to deep midwicket
Behrendorff to Karthik, 1 run loopy slower full-toss outside off, swatted down the ground to long-on. Managed to get some proper dip on it
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length, off-stumpish, worked away to deep midwicket off the back foot
Behrendorff to Karthik, 1 run another slower ball, full and fairly wide, driven to deep point
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 3 runs shortish, leg-stumpish, jumps across and nudges it away into the fine leg region. Strays in line and Dhoni picks up a clever three
Behrendorff to Karthik, 2 runs shuffles out of his crease and gets a fullish ball on off stump. Clipped away neatly, once more into that midwicket region
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run down the track and Stoinis bangs it in short. Punches it with a straight bat to long-off
Stoinis to Karthik, 2 runs fullish outside off, driven past the diving extra-cover's left hand, and to the right of sweeper cover
Stoinis to Karthik, 1 run length ball on middle stump, shows the full face to drive to long-on
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length on off stump, and Dhoni jabs it gently in front of extra-cover, a couple of yards to his right, and hustles through for a quick single

Stoinis to Karthik, 3 runs someone asked where all the scoop shots were - here it is. Slower length ball outside off, and Karthik steps across and helps it nice and fine. There's no one at short fine leg, and the man at fine leg is quite wide, more long leg than fine leg. And that placement allows these batsmen to run t
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run fullish on off stump, and Dhoni goes for the big hit down the ground. Hits it pretty well, but straight to long-on, on the bounce

Behrendorff to Dhoni, SIX runs probably not. Back of a length on off stump, and MS Dhoni absolutely Dhonies this to bring up his fifty. Leans back, clears his front leg, and brings all that bottom-hand power into play to clear long-on as well. It'll be an interesting exercise to work out how many times he's hit this bal

Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run and there's the win. The field comes in, but there's still enough gaps to sneak that single. Full, close to off stump, and Dhoni clips it just wide of mid-on and hurries through to the other end. 2018 wasn't a great year for Dhoni.
